message.content:
1. A screening process was repeatedly conducted to find an effective food for treating obesity.
2. Rosehip extract was discovered during this screening process.
3. Rosehip extract has been found to have potent anti-obesity effects.

messages.content:
Statement: We repeatedly screened to find an effective food to treat obesity and discovered that rosehip extract shows potent anti-obesity effects.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
